text:
(6 August 1972 – 27 March 2019) was a Japanese tattoo artist and musician. He was best known for his appearances in the TLC reality show "Miami Ink". He was a member of the punk rock band Big Deal. Harada and fellow tattooist, Darren Brass, founded the baby clothing company Ruthless & Toothless together.
Harada was from Tokyo. He moved to the United States when he was 24 years of age. He was married twice and had a daughter. He died on 27 March 2019 in the Netherlands, at the age of 46.
